creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: short, squat, crescent-shaped flower basket with low dipping front and back; open, crisscross weave with closely woven horizontal elements; handle made of three nearly symmetrical, crooked bamboo branches that come to a steep peak in the middle; oblong, deep copper flower tray in center
title: (Flower basket with handle)
